movies.title: Titanic
movies.actors: Sybille Schmitz , Hans Nielsen , Kirsten Heiberg
movies.plot: Building the Titanic has been a huge financial effort, and White Star Line president Ismay wants her maiden voyage to hit the headlines. He urges Captain Smith to make the fastest possible crossing to New York. When iceberg warnings come in, the captain must ask himself if he is willing to risk the safety of his ship just to please Ismay.
movies.name: Titanic

movies.title: Guardians
movies.actors: Nathan Dainty , Lily Frazer , Matthew McPherson
movies.plot: Written as a proof of concept as well as stand-alone prologue to forthcoming horror feature "Reunion", Guardians tells the story of a young man who is moving into an abandoned school as a live-in guardian. One drizzly night, he meets estate agent Helen, who shows him into the school, leading them both into a terrifying trap.
movies.name: Guardians

movies.title: Alien
movies.actors: Nicole Freeman , Mirko Grillini , Michael Loader
movies.production: Backlot Studios, The, Magic Sound Company, Mezzanine productions
movies.name: Alien

movies.title: Hercules
movies.actors: Biswajit Chakraborty , Parambrata Chatterjee , Saswata Chatterjee
movies.plot: Hercules is the story of a common man: His actual name is Harakailash, his timid nature and compromising attitude has prompted the local people to call him Hercules in jest.
movies.name: Hercules
